title: Melinda French Gates | World Bank Live

time_markers.text: the first decade of her career
quotes: Melinda spent the first decade of her career developing multimedia products at Microsoft before leaving the company to focus on her family and philanthropic work.

organizations.name: Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation
quotes: As the co-chair of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Melinda sets the direction and priorities of the world’s largest philanthropy.

organizations.name: Pivotal Ventures
quotes: She is also the founder of Pivotal Ventures, an investment and incubation company working to drive social progress for women and families in the United States,

organizations.name: Duke University
quotes: She received a bachelor’s degree in computer science from Duke University and an MBA from Duke’s Fuqua School.

Melinda grew up in Dallas, Texas.
She has three children, Jenn, Rory, and Phoebe, and lives in Seattle, Washington.
